name: Journey through pixel world
description:
Journey through pixel world is a simple runner style arcade game where you have to jump with your player and have to avoid hitting the simple geometric shaped obsticles. Journey through pixel world is one of the best time killer games out there.

How to Play:
To jump with your player you have to tap anywhere on the screen. If obsticles are near together hold your finger on the screen to make a continious jump. Avoid geometric shaped obsticles as long as you can. Game will be quicker and quicker over time.

If you like Journey through pixel give it a rate and a review to this game.
